thread.title: Thieves tried to tip woman, 55, from wheelchair before snatching handbag near Yorkshire coast
thread.title_full: Thieves tried to tip woman, 55, from wheelchair before snatching handbag near Yorkshire coast | Calendar - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Thieves tried to tip woman, 55, from wheelchair before snatching handbag near Yorkshire coast
text:
Police are hunting four men who tried to tip a woman from her wheelchair before snatching her handbag in Bridlington and running away.
Two of the men blocked the woman's path as she travelled along the footpath between Midway Avenue and St John's Avenue on Tuesday at around 7.30pm.
They then tried to tip the 55-year-old from her wheelchair and stole her black leather handbag.
All four suspects were in their late teens to early 20s. Two wore tracksuit bottoms and another wore blue jeans.
They had local accents and were thought to have been drinking before the incident.
Call Humberside Police 101 quoting log 2250208 with information.
Last updated Fri 17 Feb 2017 East Yorkshire
